Elegant Strike.name: Elegant Strike
Elegant Strike.flavor: You move and strike with a dancer’s grace, confounding your foe.
Elegant Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.
Elegant Strike.weapon: If you are wielding a light blade or a heavy blade, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Graceful Step.name: Graceful Step
Graceful Step.flavor: You maneuver with speed and balance that few warriors can match.
Graceful Step.effect: You shift your speed. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and gain a +5 bonus to Acrobatics checks and Athletics checks.

Corellon’s Wrath.name: Corellon’s Wrath
Corellon’s Wrath.flavor: Just as Corellon’s blade once took the eye of Gruumsh, so too does your weapon seek your enemy’s eyes.
Corellon’s Wrath.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Corellon’s Wrath.effect: Your opportunity attacks deal 1d10 extra radiant damage until the end of the encounter.
